name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.66 - Major Feature Update
lastChange: Fixed TypeScript build error. Implemented extensive UI/UX overhaul including a new Theme Editor, updated Calendar views, and bulk content management. Added new features like automated backups, an AI prompt generator, profile picture uploads, and guild-specific themes. Enhanced AI Studio and customization options.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
